metadata.title: CVE-2021-4020 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
janus-gateway is vulnerable to Improper Neutralization of Input During WebPage Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4020` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

janus - 1.0.4-1
janus-demos - 1.0.4-1
janus-tools - 1.0.4-1
libjs-janus-gateway - 1.0.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: janus package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.4-1').
